title: Shoujo Kageki Revue Starlight - Unscripted Feelings and Their Several Accompanying Circumstances (Doujinshi)
description:
Maya and Claudine are practicing for a two-person stage performance when their mutual admiration for each other culminates in an emotionally satisfying crescendo. [Yuri Doujinshi]

Source Anime: Shoujo Kageki Revue Starlight
